wikipedia_page.main:
George Handel Heath-Gracie  (4 June 1892 – 20 April 1987) was an English musician. He was Head Teacher at Derby School of Music (1938–1944), a composer and cathedral organist, who served in Derby Cathedral.George Handel Heath-Gracie was born in Gosport, Hampshire, and educated at Bristol Grammar School.
He was the organist of St. Peter's Church, Brockley, Kent (1918–1933) and Derby Cathedral (1933–1958).
